attributes.action: Keep Richard Allinson's show on BBC Radio 2
attributes.additional_details:
The BBC are planning to axe Richard Allinson's weekend show on Radio 2, much to the devoted listeners' dismay.
Please keep this much-loved show and presenter on air by preventing the powers that be at "OUR" BBC to ride roughshod over the wishes of the listeners.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
